sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import "./billingStyle.scss"; export default function BillingInvoice(props) { const { invoiceData } = props; // const dateTimeStamp = 1689154627; // Create a new Date object with the Unix timestamp (multiply by 1000 to convert seconds to milliseconds) const date = new Date(invoiceData?.invoiceData?.created_at * 1000); // Get the localized string representation of the date and time const paymentDate = date.toLocaleDateString(); return

Hey {invoiceData.name},

This is the receipt for a payment of {invoiceData?.invoiceData?.amount} ({invoiceData?.invoiceData?.currency}) you made to Spacial Themes.

Payment No.
#{invoiceData?.invoiceData?.id}
Payment Date
{paymentDate}
{/*
Client
John McClane

989 5th Avenue, New York, 55832
john@email.com

Payment To
Themes LLC

9th Avenue, San Francisco 99383
themes@email.com

*/} {/*
Description Amount
Theme customization $60.00
Website design $80.00
*/} {/*

Subtotal:

390.00

Discount:

-40.00
Total:
399.99 USD
*/}
}
